Body:
"""PersonsView:put"""
global uid
res = client.put('/v1/persons/' + uid, data=json.dumps({'first_name':
    'test3', 'last_name': 'test4'}), headers={'content-type':
    'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 200
old_uid = uid
if 'uid' in res.json:
    uid = res.json['uid']
assert old_uid != uid
assert 'uid' in res.json
